category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA84_mapping_num_of_decimal_digits
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to define the number of digits after decimal to be used in attribute mapping when converting a Teamcenter attribute of type "Double" to an AutoCAD attribute (always string typed). The default value is -1 and it makes double values to be converted preserving all the digits after decimal. Note: when the mapped attribute can be edited in both AutoCAD and Teamcenter environment (/master=both) the preference is used to format the number to a string only if it is greater than 6 (6 being the default number of digits used to format a number into a string). The ratio is to avoid losing precision when converting the string back to the double attribute.
